related_questions.question:
The text is for questions 20 to 21 *    a.Javanese Hawk.

b.Wonosadi Forest.

c.The writer’s cousin.

d.A hike in the forest

21.	“We sat down and relaxed under the shades of four gigantic and ancient trees.”The underlined word is closest in meaning to … . *


a.very big

b.very small

c.very old

d.very young

The text is a part of a song. Read it to answer questions 22 to 23.

I know a girl
She puts the color inside of my world
But she’s just like a maze
Where all the walls all continually change

Fathers, be good to your daughters
Daughters will love you like you do
Girls become lovers who turn into mothers
So mothers, be good to your daughters, too.

22.	What is the song about? *


a,Family.

b,Mothers.

c,Daughters

d,Fathers




​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

20. a. Javanese Hawk 21. a. Very Big 22. a. Family

Penjelasan:

Semoga TerEnt- Membantu! :D

Jawaban:

20. D. A hike in the forest

21. C. very old

22. C. daughters

Semoga terbantu✌

related_questions.question:
Dinda    (run) so fast because there
(be) a dog
Mia and her friend
(borrow) some books from the library
The school janitor
(sweep) the floor last night.
Mr Betty
(teach) and
(speak) English in the class.
My family
(miss) the plane because we (wake up) late​

answers.answer:
Dinda is running so fast because there is a dog

Mia and her friends are borrowing some books from the library

The school janitor was sweeping the floor last night

My Betty teaches and speaks English in the class

My Family missed the plane because we woke up late

related_questions.question:
2.    2015 ...
A. Two thousand and fifteen
B. Twenty fifteen
C. Two fifteen
D. Two thousand fifty​

19. Indri    Sinta : Today is September 9.
Indri : I see, thanks
a. What day is it today? c. Is today the September 9?
b. What date is it today? d. When will we leave?​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

B. What date is it today?

Penjelasan: Date biasa digunakan jika jawaban memiliki angka seperti: Desember 4

Day biasa digunakan jika jawaban hanya memiliki hari tidak ada angka seperti: Friday

Jawaban:

a. What day is it today?
